import React, { useEffect } from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { connect } from "react-redux"; import { bindActionCreators } from "redux"; import { Breadcrumb, BreadcrumbItem, Badge } from "reactstrap"; import { history } from "../../../../commons/helpers/history/history"; import "../../../asset/css/account.css"; import "bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.css"; import * as accountActions from "../../../actions/account"; import { DeleteModal } from "../../../../commons/components/modal/"; import EditModal from "../Modal"; const DetailAccount = props => { const { accountItem } = props; const id = Number(history.location.pathname.substring(13)); //------------------DETAIL ACCOUNT-------------- useEffect(() => { const { fetchAccountItemRequest } = props.accountActions; fetchAccountItemRequest(id); // eslint-disable-next-line }, [id]); //------------------DELETE ACCOUNT-------------- const handleDeleteAccount = item => { const { deleteAccountRequest } = props.accountActions; deleteAccountRequest(item.id); }; const data = accountItem[id - 1]; return (
Home Accounts detail {id !== undefined && (

Private informations

Name
{data.profile.name}
Phone number
{data.profile.phone_number}
Address
{data.profile.address}
Gender
{data.profile.sex}
Date of birth
{data.profile.date_of_birth}
Email
{data.email}
ID card
{data.id_card}
Contract type
{data.contract_type}
Position
{data.position}

Staff information

Joined date
{data.joining_date}
Status
{data.status ? ( Active ) : ( Deactive )}
Official date
{data.official_date}
Roles
{data.roles[0].name}
)}
); }; const mapStateToProps = state => { return { accountItem: state.accountReducer.listAccount }; }; const mapDispatchToProps = dispatch => { return { accountActions: bindActionCreators(accountActions, dispatch) }; }; export default connect(mapStateToProps, mapDispatchToProps)(DetailAccount);
